title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1819/95 of 26 July 1995 fixing for the 1995/96 marketing year the production aid for tinned pineapple and the minimum price to be paid to pineapple producers
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1819/95 of 26 July 1995 fixing for the 1995/96  marketing year the production aid for tinned pineapple and the minimum price to be paid to  pineapple producers
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
>TABLE>
>TABLE>
